title: Game won't connect after champion select.
body: So played a few games with my fiance today, we run on the same network off the same router, never had any problems before. Now all the sudden she can't log on to the legacy client, has to log on using the new one, and every single game it won't let her connect after we get past champion select. I've done EVERYTHING on the support and connection page, I've flushed the dns and tried everything I could find on this forum. It is in no way our network because I connect and play just fine sitting right next to her. We have NEVER had this problem before and I'm going to get very upset if leaverbuster starts making us wait in low priority que because all of the sudden riot won't let her connect.  Her screen name is Skylight082. Shes running a repair now after already trying a reinstall and it failing. Any help would be greatly appreciated cause I'm getting severely frustrated.

replies.body: I'm having the exact same issue, having also tried the exact same measures you have. Pretty major fuck-up on Riot's part, hope they get their shit working again soon or hire someone who can.

I think I've discovered a fix. 

Find "lol.launcher.exe" in your League folder, right click that and click "Properties" on the bottom.

Next click "Compatibility" and from there go to the bottom where it says "Change Settings For All Users".

Click "Run this program in Compatibility mode for:" in Compatibility Mode.

There should be a drop-down choice menu. Click on "Windows XP (Service Pack 3)."

It worked for me. I also read something somewhere about using Shift + Enter if you have a black screen so I did that too, not entirely sure if that was relevant to the fix though, lol.
Well it let her log in, and it's connected to the chat server. Which is farther then I got all last night. Now we gotta suffer through the low priority que to see if it will let her connect.

They should give people that get wrongly banned by leaver buster a 5 game ip boost or some shit to make up for it. It's pretty ignorant on their end to just let us suffer. Been using the laptop for league for months then out of the blue all the sudden it doesn't work anymore.
It's worked for a friend who had this problem for a couple of patches, thank you for the fix (Honored)
I can't find "lol.launcher.exe". Please be specific, I really want to play this game again and I cant.
didnt work for me lol
What exactly do you mean when you say "Find "lol.launcher.exe" in your League folder"?
gotta love how much riot cares about helping its community. Still a problem........
So still no one with a plausible fix, just "Did you turn it off and on again". {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
NOTHING IS WORKING. Fails to connect to server after champ select everytime.
Yeah i cant connect after campion select pla help me riot..
did u fixed that?
yeah i got that too

Riot please help us we are trying to play your game. I spend a lot of money on thta game. and i get the same problem, its getting me insane.MY name is  ''viperghiost999''. PLEASE DO SOEMTHING.i have about 8 leaver busters from that thing. and i dont want to lose that game its the best! Solve this solution>because i tried every single thingand it did not word. :(
i have the exact problem.I did not play league for 2 weeks now and iam so sad. so please find a solution. i tried everything but nothing works.

Its a Compatibility problem. Apparently the client decides at some point it has an issue with one of the updates with windows 10.  As Sloth Inquisitor said rick

ind "lol.launcher.exe" in your League folder, right click that and click "Properties" on the bottom.

Next run "Compatibility trouble shooter"

Then click "Troubleshoot Program". 

Next click the options " Problem is not listed "

Once you get to the option to run on a previous version of windows. Its trial of elimination until you're league client starts connecting to the game server (meaning try every option on that list until it works, mine worked with windows 7).

Hope this helps.
Still getting this problem

I definitely wouldn't recommend she test any changes in a real match, as continuing to do so could land the account in a *low priority queue*. She could test those changes in a custom match instead and avoid any penalties. Since this is only happening on one PC, I'd recommend trying another network adapter or simply updating the network adapter's driver, since the adapter or the driver itself could be causing the problem.

Let me know if either of those steps caused any change.
Sloth's recommendation fixed the problem but we are still in a low priority que. It's actually pretty dumb.

An account will only see a *low-priority queue* after disconnecting from multiple games. We understand that sometimes emergencies happen, but a consistent and common trend of leaving will eventually land the account in an LPQ. This is because regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively affects everyone in the match. This is a contributing factor as to why all disconnections are treated equally and why we are unable to remove penalties associated with disconnections for any reason. You can find more details on the system in our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any questions.

I need help. I have exactly the same problem. I was in champ select on flex and couldn't reconnect. It just says Game is progress. My team remade and I lost 21 lp for that. I restarted pc, router, tried some of the suggestions here. Then on champ select again and still couldn't connect to the game. Worse is I got demoted. idek anymore

update: I did a full repair on the client and it worked which means this issue isn't really my fault. I wish riot can see the inconvenience their system is giving to some of us. Also I am on LPQ for 5 games. lol
what do you mean that you did a full repair on the client? can you work me through these steps so that I can get league to work again?

She only got the que because some random error happened that kept disconnecting her from games, league should at least be able to see she was continuously trying to reconnect and not being allowed. There wasn't any emergencies. I had to reformat the whole computer to get league to work on it again. It's stupid that it worked for MONTHS with no problem then just randomly couldn't connect anymore.  This wasn't her fault, it was something in the league patch proccess that messed her up, so us being punished for a problem league has been having for YEARS is just a bit ludacris.
None of these steps changed anything. I even tried making a custom game and could not connect to that as well. I need some major help here I've been trying to correct this for almost 2 months now.
Did you ever find a fix to this problem?
I have same problem pls help me
Plss help me why i cant connect after champion select???  Help me riot pls
